summary: Why the Invitation Homes Narrative Just Shifted Analysts have nudged their fair value estimate for Invitation Homes from about US$34.48 to roughly US$33.80 and adjusted their discount rate from 7.39% to around 7.41%, reflecting a slightly more cautious stance on risk and return. At the same time, revenue growth assumptions have moved from 5.09% to about 4.68% as research notes factor in tighter rent and occupancy expectations against a backdrop of closer regulatory scrutiny of single family...

headline: Is Invitation Homes (INVH) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Invitation Homes is attractively priced or just fairly valued at today's levels, this article will walk you through what the numbers are saying about the stock. The share price last closed at US$27.65, with returns of 5.4% over the past 7 days, 2.2% over 30 days, a slight year to date decline of 0.3%, a 1 year decline of 7.9%, and a 3 year decline of 3.2%, while the 5 year return sits at 8.4%.
